description: Lee Angol's first-half goal moves Morecambe one point from safety and condemns AFC Wimbledon to a second successive defeat.
title: Morecambe 1-0 AFC Wimbledon
title_page: Morecambe 1-0 AFC Wimbledon: Lee Angol boosts Shrimps' survival hopes - BBC Sport
maintext:
Morecambe have won just one of their last five league games against AFC Wimbledon (D2 L2), though that sole victory did come in this exact fixture last season (4-1).
AFC Wimbledon are looking to record their first ever Football League double over Morecambe after their 3-0 win in October in the reverse clash.
Morecambe have lost 10 of their 16 home league games this season (W3 D3); only in 2011-12 (11), 2015-16 (13), and 2016-17 (13) have they ever lost more in a Football League campaign.
Each of AFC Wimbledonâ€™s last five away league games have ended in draws; the last side to draw six in a row on the road in League Two were Stevenage from October 2022 to February 2023.
